short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple clipboard manager for Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clipvault is a sleek and efficient Chrome extension designed to enhance your productivity by giving you complete control over your clipboard history. Easily save, manage, and reuse text snippets with just a few clicks, all within a beautiful and user-friendly interface.

Key Features:

a. Save Clipboard Items: Quickly save selected text to Clipvault using the right-click or Ctrl + click context menu. Never lose an important piece of information again.

b. Manage Clipboard History: View all your saved clipboard items in an organized list. Easily copy them back to your clipboard or delete them when no longer needed.

c. Persistent Storage: Your clipboard items are securely stored locally on your device, ensuring that they are always available, even after you close your browser.

d. Clear All Items: Conveniently clear all saved items with a single click when you need a fresh start.

How It Works:

a. Save Text: Select any text, right-click or press Ctrl + click, and choose "Save to Clipvault" from the context menu.

b. View Clipboard History: Click on the Clipvault icon in your toolbar to open the popup and view your saved items.

c. Copy or Delete Items: Use the copy button to copy text back to your clipboard, or the delete button to remove it from your list. Alerts will notify you of successful actions.

d. Clear All: Click the "Clear All" button to remove all saved items at once.

Privacy and Security:

Your privacy is our priority. Clipvault stores all data locally on your device and does not transmit any clipboard content to external servers or third parties.

Install Clipvault today and take control of your clipboard history with ease!
